name: Shadow Contrast Profile (4x Upscale)
description: Transform your photo into a dramatic black-and-white cinematic studio portrait with high-contrast side lighting + fast 4x upscale (2 credits)

default_prompts.image_edit: Use Image A as a high-fidelity facial reference for likeness and fine features (not strict identity lock). Generate a true photorealistic black-and-white studio portrait in a dramatic near-frontal pose â€” chest-up framing, torso facing forward with only a subtle 10â€“20 degree turn so both shoulders are fully visible and evenly framed, head slightly angled without hiding shoulder structure, eyes looking directly at the camera with a deep, intense expression. Use a controlled studio setup with a dark plain background and high-contrast cinematic side lighting that sculpts the face while still illuminating both shoulders. The subject must wear a dark button-up shirt with the top button clearly undone and the collar open in a relaxed V-shape, with visible collar separation and neckline; no closed collar, no tight neck, and no top button fastened or visible as closed. Enforce sharp photographic realism with natural hair texture, visible skin pores and micro-details, realistic fabric folds around the open collar, accurate facial proportions, correct head-to-shoulder scale from Image A, consistent skin tone, and proper shadow direction. Use an 85â€“100mm portrait lens look, shallow depth of field, film-grade monochrome grading, ultra-detailed, HDR clarity, razor-sharp eye focus, no color, no painterly or sketch style, no fantasy theme, no stylization, no plastic skin, and no AI artifacts.
default_prompts.upscale: Ultra high-resolution black-and-white studio portrait, cinematic side lighting, razor-sharp eye focus, film-grade monochrome, skin pore detail, 8K, HDR

steps.name: upscale
steps.description: Fast 4x upscale with Stability AI (2 credits)
